description: '''Drill 'n' bass''' is a subgenre of [[drum and bass]] which developed in the mid-1990s as [[intelligent dance music|IDM]] artists began experimenting with elements of [[jungle music|jungle]] and [[breakbeat hardcore|breakbeat]] music. Artists utilized powerful [[digital audio workstation|audio software]] to program frenzied, irregular beats that often discouraged dancing. The style was often interpreted as having a lightly [[Parody|parodic]] relationship with the [[Dance music|dance]] styles that inspired it.
